GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
mm: hugetlb: fix UAF in hugetlb_handle_userfault

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 45c33966759ea1b4040c08dacda99ef623c0ca29, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 1a1aad8a9b7bd34f60cdf98cd7915f00ae892c45. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm: hugetlb: fix UAF in hugetlb_handle_userfault
